preBuiltAgentsCalloutTelegram.displayName: Interact with Telegram using our pre-built
preBuiltAgentsCalloutTelegram.name: preBuiltAgentsCalloutTelegram

descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

options.name: Set Manually
options.description: Manually set the description

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Delete Chat Message
options.description: Delete a chat message

options.name: Edit Message Text
options.description: Edit a text message

options.name: Pin Chat Message
options.description: Pin a chat message

options.name: Send Animation
options.description: Send an animated file

options.name: Send Audio
options.description: Send a audio file

options.name: Send Chat Action
options.description: Send a chat action

options.name: Send Document
options.description: Send a document

options.name: Send Location
options.description: Send a location

options.name: Send Media Group
options.description: Send group of photos or videos to album

options.name: Send Message
options.description: Send a text message

options.name: Send and Wait for Response
options.description: Send a message and wait for response
options.action: Send message and wait for response

options.name: Send Photo
options.description: Send a photo

options.name: Send Sticker
options.description: Send a sticker

options.name: Send Video
options.description: Send a video

options.name: Unpin Chat Message
options.description: Unpin a chat message

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

chatId.name: chatId
chatId.description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername). To find your chat ID ask @get_id_bot.
chatId.ai_hint: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername). To find your chat ID ask @get_id_bot.

messageId.name: messageId
messageId.description: Unique identifier of the message to edit
messageId.ai_hint: Unique identifier of the message to edit

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: appendAttribution
options.description: Whether to include the phrase “This message was sent automatically with n8n” to the end of the message

options.name: caption
options.description: Caption text to set, 0-1024 characters

options.name: disable_notification
options.description: Whether to send the message silently. Users will receive a notification with no sound.

options.name: disable_web_page_preview
options.description: Whether to disable link previews for links in this message

options.name: duration
options.description: Duration of clip in seconds

options.name: height
options.description: Height of the video

options.name: parse_mode
options.description: How to parse the text

options.name: performer
options.description: Name of the performer

options.name: reply_to_message_id
options.description: If the message is a reply, ID of the original message

options.name: message_thread_id
options.description: The unique identifier of the forum topic

options.name: title
options.description: Title of the track

options.name: thumb
options.description: Thumbnail of the file sent; can be ignored if thumbnail generation for the file is supported server-side. The thumbnail should be in JPEG format and less than 200 kB in size. A thumbnail‘s width and height should not exceed 320.

options.name: width
options.description: Width of the video

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

userId.name: userId
userId.description: Unique identifier of the target user
userId.ai_hint: Unique identifier of the target user

queryId.name: queryId
queryId.description: Unique identifier for the answered query
queryId.ai_hint: Unique identifier for the answered query

results.name: results
results.description: A JSON-serialized array of results for the inline query
results.ai_hint: A JSON-serialized array of results for the inline query

messageType.name: messageType
messageType.description: The type of the message to edit
messageType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

binaryData.name: binaryData
binaryData.description: Whether the data to upload should be taken from binary field

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.hint: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be written
binaryPropertyName.description: Name of the binary property that contains the data to upload
binaryPropertyName.ai_hint: Name of the binary property that contains the data to upload

inlineMessageId.name: inlineMessageId
inlineMessageId.description: Unique identifier of the inline message to edit
inlineMessageId.ai_hint: Unique identifier of the inline message to edit

replyMarkup.name: replyMarkup
replyMarkup.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

file.name: file
file.description: Video file to send. Pass a file_id to send a file that exists on the Telegram servers (recommended), an HTTP URL for Telegram to get a file from the Internet.
file.ai_hint: Video file to send. Pass a file_id to send a file that exists on the Telegram servers (recommended), an HTTP URL for Telegram to get a file from the Internet.

action.name: action
action.description: Type of action to broadcast. Choose one, depending on what the user is about to receive. The status is set for 5 seconds or less (when a message arrives from your bot).
action.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

media.name: media

values.name: type
values.description: The type of the media to add

values.name: media
values.description: Media to send. Pass a file_id to send a file that exists on the Telegram servers (recommended) or pass an HTTP URL for Telegram to get a file from the Internet.

options.name: caption
options.description: Caption text to set, 0-1024 characters

options.name: parse_mode
options.description: How to parse the text

media.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

text.name: text
text.description: Text of the message to be sent
text.ai_hint: Text of the message to be sent

forceReply.name: forceReply

options.name: force_reply
options.description: Whether to show reply interface to the user, as if they manually selected the bot‘s message and tapped ’Reply

options.name: selective
options.description: Whether to force reply from specific users only

forceReply.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

inlineKeyboard.name: inlineKeyboard
inlineKeyboard.description: Adds an inline keyboard that appears right next to the message it belongs to

values.name: row
values.description: The value to set

values.name: text
values.description: Label text on the button

options.name: callback_data
options.description: Data to be sent in a callback query to the bot when button is pressed, 1-64 bytes

options.name: pay
options.description: Whether to send a Pay button

options.name: switch_inline_query_current_chat
options.description: If set, pressing the button will insert the bot‘s username and the specified inline query in the current chat's input field.Can be empty, in which case only the bot’s username will be inserted

options.name: switch_inline_query
options.description: If set, pressing the button will prompt the user to select one of their chats, open that chat and insert the bot‘s username and the specified inline query in the input field. Can be empty, in which case just the bot’s username will be inserted.

options.name: url
options.description: HTTP or tg:// URL to be opened when button is pressed

options.name: web_app
url
options.description: An HTTPS URL of a Web App to be opened
Launch the Telegram Web App

inlineKeyboard.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

replyKeyboard.name: replyKeyboard
replyKeyboard.description: Adds a custom keyboard with reply options

values.name: row
values.description: The value to set

values.name: text
values.description: Text of the button. If none of the optional fields are used, it will be sent as a message when the button is pressed.

options.name: request_contact
options.description: Whether the user's phone number will be sent as a contact when the button is pressed.Available in private chats only

options.name: request_location
options.description: Whether the user's request_location

options.name: web_app
url
options.description: An HTTPS URL of a Web App to be opened
Launch the Telegram Web App

replyKeyboard.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

replyKeyboardOptions.name: replyKeyboardOptions

options.name: resize_keyboard
options.description: Whether to request clients to resize the keyboard vertically for optimal fit

options.name: one_time_keyboard
options.description: Whether to request clients to hide the keyboard as soon as it's been used

options.name: selective
options.description: Whether to show the keyboard to specific users only

replyKeyboardOptions.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

replyKeyboardRemove.name: replyKeyboardRemove

options.name: remove_keyboard
options.description: Whether to request clients to remove the custom keyboard

options.name: selective
options.description: Whether to force reply from specific users only

replyKeyboardRemove.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

responseType.name: responseType

options.name: Approval
options.description: User can approve/disapprove from within the message

options.name: Free Text
options.description: User can submit a response via a form

options.name: Custom Form
options.description: User can submit a response via a custom form

responseType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

defineForm.name: defineForm
defineForm.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

jsonOutput.name: jsonOutput

formFields.name: formFields

values.name: fieldLabel
values.description: Label that appears above the input field

values.name: fieldName
values.description: The name of the field, used in input attributes and referenced by the workflow

values.name: fieldType
values.description: The type of field to add to the form

values.name: elementName
values.description: Optional field. It can be used to include the html in the output.

values.name: placeholder
values.description: Sample text to display inside the field

values.name: defaultValue
values.description: Default value that will be pre-filled in the form field

values.name: defaultValue
values.description: Default date value that will be pre-filled in the form field (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

values.name: defaultValue
values.description: Default value that will be pre-selected. Must match one of the option labels.

values.name: defaultValue
values.description: Default value(s) that will be pre-selected. Must match one or multiple of the option labels. Separate multiple pre-selected options with a comma.

values.name: fieldValue
values.description: Input value can be set here or will be passed as a query parameter via Field Name if no value is set

values.name: fieldOptions
values.description: List of options that can be selected from the dropdown

values.displayName: Multiple Choice is a legacy option, please use Checkboxes or Radio Buttons field type instead
values.name: multiselectLegacyNotice
multiselect
values.description: Whether to allow the user to select multiple options from the dropdown list

values.name: html
values.description: HTML elements to display on the form page

values.name: multipleFiles
values.description: Whether to allow the user to select multiple files from the file input or just one

values.name: acceptFileTypes
values.description: Comma-separated list of allowed file extensions
values.hint: Leave empty to allow all file types

values.displayName: The displayed date is formatted based on the locale of the user's browser
values.name: formatDate
requiredField
values.description: Whether to require the user to enter a value for this field before submitting the form

formFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

approvalOptions.name: approvalOptions
approvalOptions.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

options.name: options
responseFormTitle
options.description: Title of the form that the user can access to provide their response

options.name: responseFormDescription
options.description: Description of the form that the user can access to provide their response

options.name: responseFormCustomCss
options.description: Override default styling of the response form with CSS

options.name: limitWaitTime
options.description: Whether the workflow will automatically resume execution after the specified limit type

values.name: limitType
values.description: Sets the condition for the execution to resume. Can be a specified date or after some time.

options.name: After Time Interval
options.description: Waits for a certain amount of time

options.name: At Specified Time
options.description: Waits until the set date and time to continue

values.name: resumeAmount
values.description: The time to wait

values.name: resumeUnit
values.description: Unit of the interval value

values.name: maxDateAndTime
values.description: Continue execution after the specified date and time

options.name: appendAttribution
options.description: Whether to include the phrase "This message was sent automatically with n8n" to the end of the message

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'chat' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'callback' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'

IF operation IN ["administrators", "deleteMessage", "get", "leave", "member", "pinChatMessage", "setDescription", "setTitle", "sendAnimation", "sendAudio", "sendChatAction", "sendDocument", "sendLocation", "sendMessage", "sendMediaGroup", "sendPhoto", "sendSticker", "sendVideo", "unpinChatMessage"] AND resource IN ["chat", "message"] THEN SHOW parameter 'chatId'
IF operation == 'deleteMessage' AND resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'messageId'
IF operation IN ["pinChatMessage", "unpinChatMessage"] AND resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'messageId'
IF operation == 'pinChatMessage' AND resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'member' AND resource == 'chat' THEN SHOW parameter 'userId'
IF operation == 'setDescription' AND resource == 'chat' THEN SHOW parameter 'description'
IF operation == 'setTitle' AND resource == 'chat' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF operation == 'answerQuery' AND resource == 'callback' THEN SHOW parameter 'queryId'
IF operation == 'answerQuery' AND resource == 'callback' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'answerInlineQuery' AND resource == 'callback' THEN SHOW parameter 'queryId'
IF operation == 'answerInlineQuery' AND resource == 'callback' THEN SHOW parameter 'results'
IF operation == 'answerInlineQuery' AND resource == 'callback' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileId'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'download'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'file' AND download == True THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'editMessageText' AND resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'messageType'
IF messageType == 'message' AND operation == 'editMessageText' AND resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'chatId'
IF operation IN ["sendAnimation", "sendAudio", "sendDocument", "sendPhoto", "sendVideo", "sendSticker"] AND resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryData'
IF operation IN ["sendAnimation", "sendAudio", "sendDocument", "sendPhoto", "sendVideo", "sendSticker"] AND resource == 'message' AND binaryData == True THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF messageType == 'message' AND operation == 'editMessageText' AND resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'messageId'
IF messageType == 'inlineMessage' AND operation == 'editMessageText' AND resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'inlineMessageId'
IF operation == 'editMessageText' AND resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'replyMarkup'
IF operation == 'sendAnimation' AND resource == 'message' AND binaryData == False THEN SHOW parameter 'file'
IF operation == 'sendAudio' AND resource == 'message' AND binaryData == False THEN SHOW parameter 'file'
IF operation == 'sendChatAction' AND resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'action'
IF operation == 'sendDocument' AND resource == 'message' AND binaryData == False THEN SHOW parameter 'file'
IF operation == 'sendLocation' AND resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'latitude'
IF operation == 'sendLocation' AND resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'longitude'
IF operation == 'sendMediaGroup' AND resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'media'
IF operation IN ["editMessageText", "sendMessage"] AND resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF operation == 'sendPhoto' AND resource == 'message' AND binaryData == False THEN SHOW parameter 'file'
IF operation == 'sendSticker' AND resource == 'message' AND binaryData == False THEN SHOW parameter 'file'
IF operation == 'sendVideo' AND resource == 'message' AND binaryData == False THEN SHOW parameter 'file'
IF operation IN ["sendAnimation", "sendDocument", "sendMessage", "sendPhoto", "sendSticker", "sendVideo", "sendAudio", "sendLocation"] AND resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'replyMarkup'
IF replyMarkup == 'forceReply' AND resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'forceReply'
IF replyMarkup == 'inlineKeyboard' AND resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'inlineKeyboard'
IF replyMarkup == 'replyKeyboard' THEN SHOW parameter 'replyKeyboard'
IF replyMarkup == 'replyKeyboard' THEN SHOW parameter 'replyKeyboardOptions'
IF replyMarkup == 'replyKeyboardRemove' THEN SHOW parameter 'replyKeyboardRemove'

IF operation IN ["editMessageText", "sendAnimation", "sendAudio", "sendDocument", "sendLocation", "sendMessage", "sendMediaGroup", "sendPhoto", "sendSticker", "sendVideo"] AND resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF /operation == 'sendMessage' THEN SHOW parameter 'appendAttribution'
IF /operation IN ["sendAnimation", "sendAudio", "sendDocument", "sendPhoto", "sendVideo"] THEN SHOW parameter 'caption'
IF /operation == 'editMessageText' THEN HIDE parameter 'disable_notification'
IF /operation IN ["editMessageText", "sendMessage"] THEN SHOW parameter 'disable_web_page_preview'
IF /operation IN ["sendAnimation", "sendAudio", "sendVideo"] THEN SHOW parameter 'duration'
IF /operation IN ["sendAnimation", "sendAudio", "sendDocument", "sendPhoto", "sendVideo", "sendSticker"] AND /resource == 'message' AND /binaryData == True THEN SHOW parameter 'fileName'
IF /operation IN ["sendAnimation", "sendVideo"] THEN SHOW parameter 'height'
IF /operation IN ["editMessageText", "sendAnimation", "sendAudio", "sendMessage", "sendPhoto", "sendVideo", "sendDocument"] THEN SHOW parameter 'parse_mode'
IF /operation == 'sendAudio' THEN SHOW parameter 'performer'
IF /operation == 'editMessageText' THEN HIDE parameter 'reply_to_message_id'

IF /operation IN ["sendAnimation", "sendAudio", "sendChatAction", "sendDocument", "sendLocation", "sendMediaGroup", "sendMessage", "sendPhoto", "sendSticker", "sendVideo"] THEN SHOW parameter 'message_thread_id'
IF /operation == 'sendAudio' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF /operation IN ["sendAnimation", "sendAudio", "sendDocument", "sendVideo"] THEN SHOW parameter 'thumb'
IF /operation IN ["sendAnimation", "sendVideo"] THEN SHOW parameter 'width'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'chatId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'message'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'responseType'
IF responseType == 'customForm' AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'defineForm'
IF defineForm == 'json' AND responseType == 'customForm' AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonOutput'
IF defineForm == 'fields' AND responseType == 'customForm' AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'formFields'
IF fieldType IN ["hiddenField", "html"] THEN HIDE parameter 'fieldLabel'
IF fieldType == 'hiddenField' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldName'
IF fieldType == 'html' THEN SHOW parameter 'elementName'
IF fieldType IN ["dropdown", "date", "file", "html", "hiddenField", "radio", "checkbox"] THEN HIDE parameter 'placeholder'
IF fieldType IN ["text", "number", "email", "textarea"] THEN SHOW parameter 'defaultValue'
IF fieldType == 'date' THEN SHOW parameter 'defaultValue'
IF fieldType IN ["dropdown", "radio"] THEN SHOW parameter 'defaultValue'
IF fieldType == 'checkbox' THEN SHOW parameter 'defaultValue'
IF fieldType == 'hiddenField' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldValue'
IF fieldType == 'dropdown' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldOptions'
IF fieldType == 'checkbox' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldOptions'
IF fieldType == 'radio' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldOptions'
IF multiselect == True AND fieldType == 'dropdown' AND @version == {'_cnd': {'lt': 2.3}} THEN SHOW parameter 'multiselectLegacyNotice'
IF fieldType == 'dropdown' AND @version == {'_cnd': {'lt': 2.3}} THEN SHOW parameter 'multiselect'
IF fieldType == 'checkbox' THEN SHOW parameter 'limitSelection'
IF fieldType == 'checkbox' AND limitSelection == 'exact' THEN SHOW parameter 'numberOfSelections'
IF fieldType == 'checkbox' AND limitSelection == 'range' THEN SHOW parameter 'minSelections'
IF fieldType == 'checkbox' AND limitSelection == 'range' THEN SHOW parameter 'maxSelections'
IF fieldType == 'html' THEN SHOW parameter 'html'
IF fieldType == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'multipleFiles'
IF fieldType == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'acceptFileTypes'
IF fieldType == 'date' THEN SHOW parameter 'formatDate'
IF fieldType IN ["html", "hiddenField"] THEN HIDE parameter 'requiredField'
IF responseType == 'approval' AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'approvalOptions'
IF approvalType IN ["single", "double"] THEN SHOW parameter 'approveLabel'
IF approvalType == 'double' THEN SHOW parameter 'disapproveLabel'
IF responseType == 'approval' AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF limitType == 'afterTimeInterval' THEN SHOW parameter 'resumeAmount'
IF limitType == 'afterTimeInterval' THEN SHOW parameter 'resumeUnit'
IF limitType == 'atSpecifiedTime' THEN SHOW parameter 'maxDateAndTime'
IF responseType IN ["freeText", "customForm"] AND resource == 'message' AND operation == 'sendAndWait' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
